metadata.name: Big Pharma
metadata.description:
Pharmaceutical companies make billions of dollars each year by getting tens of millions of people addicted to their medications. Meant for pain but used for pleasure, this is a worldwide epidemic that includes the ingestion, snorting, injecting and smoking of all types of pills of all sorts medications and just about nearly anything that can be popped, snorted, or smoked. These companies are some of the biggest drug dealers in the world and they legally operate within all parts of the entire world. Generating as much as $3 Billion for Purdue Pharma in 2021 , and $2.2 Billion for Mallinckrodt Pharmaceuticals in 2021, a major producer of Oxycodone, Hydrocodone, Oxymorphone, Fentanyl, Hydromorphone, and a plethora of many other massively addictive narcotic substances, and they all know just exactly how addictive each one of these substances really are. 

The first collector gets the 1/1 print signed by me.

4585 x 5685 :::: PNG ::: File Size: 43,801,793 bytes
